WorkItem.Description:
Repro:

Add the following style to the MainWindow.xaml from the DragNDropSample:

```
<Style TargetType="{x:Type Controls:TreeViewEx}"
       BasedOn="{StaticResource {x:Type Controls:TreeViewEx}}">
       <Setter Property="InsertionMarkerBrush" Value="Violet" />
</Style>
```

This will throw an exception while executing the Setter.

I believe this come from the fact that InsertionMarkerBrush (among a few other dependency properties from TreeViewEx.cs) is marked to have TreeViewExItem instead of TreeViewEx as owner type.
WorkItem.Summary: Customizing the InsertionMarkerBrush from a Style throws an exception

Comments.Message: You were right. It was a copyNpaste error.
